lead_paragraph: Neal Bangerter and Chris Betts joined Reactrix Systems, Redwood City, Calif., in new posts. Mr. Bangerter becomes vice president for product management; he had most recently been a business development manager and product planner in the entertainment and devices division at the Microsoft Corporation. Mr. Betts becomes vice president for corporate development; he joins from Hidden River L.L.C., San Francisco.

abstract: Microsoft will wage a proxy fight to oust Yahoo’s directors, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Microsoft will wage a proxy fight to oust Yahoo’s directors, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: In an escalation of its fight for Yahoo, Microsoft will authorize a proxy fight at the Internet company this week, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

abstract: If Microsoft succeeds in its conquest of Yahoo, what then?
lead_paragraph: If Microsoft succeeds in its conquest of Yahoo, what then?

headline.main: In Microsoft-Yahoo Deal, Technologies Could Clash

abstract: In an escalation of its fight for Yahoo, Microsoft will authorize a proxy fight at the Internet company this week, people briefed on the matter told DealBook. Unless Yahoo quickly reverses course and enters into talks, Microsoft would then seek to nominate a slate of directors to Yahoo’s board by March 13, the final deadline for nominations, and pursue a lengthy campaign to oust the board.
lead_paragraph: In an escalation of its fight for Yahoo, Microsoft will authorize a proxy fight at the Internet company this week, people briefed on the matter told DealBook. Unless Yahoo quickly reverses course and enters into talks, Microsoft would then seek to nominate a slate of directors to Yahoo’s board by March 13, the final deadline for nominations, and pursue a lengthy campaign to oust the board.

headline.main: Microsoft to Authorize Proxy Fight at Yahoo

abstract: Now that Microsoft has said it won’t raise its bid for Yahoo and is moving to take the matter to shareholders, it is time for Yahoo to say what it plans to do next.
snippet: Now that Microsoft has said it won’t raise its bid for Yahoo and is moving to take the matter to shareholders, it is time for Yahoo to say what it plans to do next.

headline.main: Listening for a Peep From Sunnyvale
